description:
Create and manage RemoteApps hosted on Windows 7, 8, 10, XP and Server. Generate RDP and MSI files for clients.


New stuff:
- RDP file options editor added under Create Client Connection
- New option to duplicate an existing RemoteApp
- Allow colons in server address fields (allows IPv6 addresses)
- Fixed issue detecting WiX (v3)
- Fixed issue that occurred when generating RDP files for MSI installers as Administrator
